toolsMP

Class POSTagger

  • java.lang.Object
    • toolsMP.POSTagger

  • public class POSTagger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the implementation of the OpenNLP Part-of-Speech (POS).
    Author:
    "Balry" - Michael Perez

      POSTagger()

      This function calculates and returns the probabilities associated with tags of the original tags by word.

    • Method Detail

      • getPOSTagsArray

        public static java.lang.String[] getPOSTagsArray(java.lang.String text)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        This function gets the Part-of-Speech tags associated with each of the words in the text string provided.
        Parameters:
        text - Text string to be tagged
        Returns:
        String array with tags of the original text by word
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If model file not found

      • getPOSTagsString

        public static java.lang.String getPOSTagsString(java.lang.String text)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        This function finds the Part-of-Speech tags associated with each of the words in the text string provided. It then combines it with the original text and returns it as a string.
        Parameters:
        text - Text string to be tagged
        Returns:
        String with tagged words in same order as original text
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If model file not found

      • getPOSTagsProb

        public static double[] getPOSTagsProb(java.lang.String text)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        This function calculates and returns the probabilities associated with tags of the original tags by word.
        Parameters:
        text - Text string to be scanned
        Returns:
        Returns the probabilities associated with the tags of the original text by word
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Demo how to use implemented functions.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If model file not found
